events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I would like to request a refund as the size does not fit me at all.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message regarding returning their purchased item.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Sarah in the refunds department for prompt handling and communication.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I’m here to help you with the refund request for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been unused and with original tags for the refund process?
My order number is 4578932. The jacket is brand new, still with tags attached and hasn’t been worn or washed yet.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately once you send the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label offer. I appreciate the smooth process and will send the item back tomorrow.
We have received the returned jacket today and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm if you have received your refund and if there’s anything more we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Everything was handled very smoothly, thank you for the great support!
We are glad your refund was successful. We are closing this case now but please reach out anytime if you need help in the future.
